text: @Jim_Jordan @realDonaldTrump The virus is non-partisan. When Ohio’s Covid-19 death rate surges now that businesses are re-opening prematurely (per the White House guidelines), let’s be sure to give credit where credit is due. I live in Jordan’s heavily gerrymandered district. He has done nothing for Ohioans.
